snippet: Nigeria’s military said it had raided an insurgent camp in the country’s northeast and launched airstrikes, killing at least 50 members of Boko Haram.
abstract: Nigeria’s military says it has raided an insurgent camp in country’s northeast and launched airstrikes, killing at least 50 members of Boko Haram.
lead_paragraph: Nigeria’s military said it had raided an insurgent camp in the country’s northeast and launched airstrikes, killing at least 50 members of Boko Haram.

headline.main: Nigeria: Military Attacks Camp of Islamic Militants in Northeast
headline.print_headline: Nigeria: Military Attacks Camp Of Islamic Militants in Northeast
